Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: cash divestedfrom divested businesses financing activities
supplemental assets acquired under capital leases
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from short term debt maturing in more than three months
proceeds from repayments of other long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt maturing in three months or less
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from stock options exercised and other financing activities
Repayment of Debt: repayments of short term debt maturing in more than three months
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: cash divestedfrom divested businesses investing activities
proceeds from sale of productive assets
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities
payments to acquire short term investments
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale of short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other operating capital net
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on sale of business
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
goodwill and indefinite lived intangibles impairment charges
goodwilland indefinitelived intangibles impairment charges including disc ops
impairment of intangible assets for grooming segment indefinite lived excluding goodwill
impairment of intangible assets indefinitelived excluding goodwill

__unmapped__: payments for or proceeds from investments
payments for proceeds from businesses and interest in affiliates
